description:
This additional content includes:

- "High-brows" makeup

A unique type of makeup with a refined, classic look. For those who want something different. 

Change up your hunter's look with this special appearance option!

- Makeup can be applied by selecting Change Appearance in the Item Box. It can also be used while creating a character.
- This item changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: "High-brows" makeup
